snippet: As a teenager, Karen Crouse interviewed swimmer Mike Bruner in 1976, and her article encouraged Bruner at the Olympic trials.
abstract: Box Seats; Karen Crouse recalls interviewing swimmer Mike Bruner in 1976 for a middle school class project, and how her article helped encourage him at the Olympic trials.
lead_paragraph: As a teenager, Karen Crouse interviewed swimmer Mike Bruner in 1976, and her article encouraged Bruner at the Olympic trials.

headline.seo: Swimmer and Young Writer Inspired Each Other in 1976
headline.main: Inspiration for a Swimmer and a Writer
headline.print_headline: Inspiration For a Swimmer And a Writer
